backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Product type and a mutable list with endpoints to initialize hardcoded products and query them by category, brand, or combined filters with optional sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (glassmorphism UI, sidebar navigation, landing page, shop page, etc.) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing short summaries of three frontend files: App.tsx (router setup), utils.ts (cn helper), and Wardrobe.tsx (wardrobe AI scanning page).
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry file that defines CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the FitVerse AI app that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with five routes across two layouts (landing without sidebar, app pages with sidebar and AnimatedBackground), wrapped in AppProvider for global state.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Canvas-based animated particle system component that renders floating glowing particles over a fixed radial-gradient mesh background to create a futuristic glassmorphism backdrop.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glassmorphism card wrapper component that applies glass styling and optional colored glow shadows (purple, blue, or pink) with hover scale transition.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component that displays a product image, category badge, fit confidence indicator, size selector, and an 'Add to Trial' button with size and wardrobe warning logic.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Collapsible vertical sidebar navigation component with icon-based nav items that expands on hover to show labels, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/SizeWarningDialo: Modal dialog that warns users when their selected clothing size differs from their body-scan recommended size, offering Cancel or Add Anyway actions.
frontend/src/components/TrialCart.tsx: Trial cart panel displaying up to 5 selected items with a progress bar, item removal, and a button to navigate to the Trial Hub page.
frontend/src/components/WardrobeWarningD: Modal dialog that surfaces AI wardrobe insights when adding an item, allowing the user to cancel or proceed with adding anyway.
frontend/src/contexts/AppContext.tsx: React context providing global app state for the trial cart, body scan data, and wardrobe data, along with their respective mutators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity state, login/clear functions, and login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all products, fetching filtered products, and initializing product data via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts (Space Grotesk, Orbitron), sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for a dark purple theme, and provides utility classes for glassmorphism, gradient text, glow effects, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/BodyScan.tsx: Body scan page that simulates an AI-powered body measurement flow with a progress bar animation, reveals mock measurements (shoulder, chest, waist, height) on completion, and saves results to app context.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing/hero page showcasing the platform's three core features (AI Body Scan, Wardrobe Intelligence, Virtual Trial Hub) with CTA buttons that navigate to the respective pages.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Shop page that fetches products from the backend, supplements them with mock data, supports category filtering, and handles adding items to the trial cart with size and wardrobe conflict warning dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/TrialHub.tsx: Trial Hub page that displays items added to the trial cart and lets users mark each item as kept or returned, tracking counts for pending, purchased, and returned items.
frontend/src/pages/Wardrobe.tsx: React page for the Wardrobe AI feature that simulates a wardrobe scan with a progress animation, then displays a dashboard with category stats (tops, jeans, dresses, jackets) and a color distribution bar chart using mock data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Space Grotesk, Orbitron), neon color palette, glassmorphism box shadows, oklch-based semantic colors, and keyframe animations for accordion, slide, and fade transitions.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for FitVerse AI describing the app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and image requirements for a futuristic AI-powered fashion e-commerce SPA with glassmorphism UI across five core pages.
